rottapeli.gui.menulayer

Class Menu

  • java.lang.Object
    • rottapeli.gui.menulayer.Menu
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ControlsMenu, CreditsMenu, HighscoreMenu, MainMenu, SettingsMenu

    public abstract class Menu
extends Object
implements ActionListener
    Menu abstract class that a concrete menu should inherit.
    Author:
    Pavel

      • showMenu

        public abstract void showMenu()
        Performs all necessary actions to make this menu show up. Creates all neccessary components.

      • hideMenu

        public void hideMenu()
        Makes all necessary actions to make this menu not show up anymore. Removes all components created by this menu.
